elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: Read the following situation. Then assign Lars to one of the four phases of the identity development model.

elements.name: Frage 1
elements.title: Give reasons for your assignment.
elements.correctAnswer: Diffuse identity: Lars doesn't seem to have any clear points of view/plans/interests, he doesn't want to commit himself, seems unable to make decisions, he searches and lets himself drift.

elements.name: Frage 2
elements.title: Compare your positioning of Lars with your own positioning in the model with regard to the roles of apprentice, employee and colleague. List the differences and any similarities.
